info.title: Opc-Registry-Service
info.description: Azure Industrial IoT OPC UA Registry Service

get.description:
Get all registered applications in paged form.
The returned model can contain a continuation token if more results are
available.
Call this operation again using the token to retrieve more results.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description:
Optional number of results to
            return

put.description:
The application is registered using the provided information, but it
is not associated with a supervisor.  This is useful for when you need
to register clients or you want to register a server that is located
in a network not reachable through a Twin module.

post.description:
Registers a server solely using a discovery url. Requires that
the onboarding agent service is running and the server can be
located by a supervisor in its network using the discovery url.

delete.description: Purges all applications that have not been seen for a specified amount of time.

post.description: A manager can disable an application.
A manager can enable an application.

Registers servers by running a discovery scan in a supervisor's
network. Requires that the onboarding agent service is running.

delete.description: Unregisters and deletes application and all its associated endpoints.

patch.description:
The application information is updated with new properties.  Note that
this information might be overridden if the application is re-discovered
during a discovery run (recurring or one-time).

get.description: List all sites applications are registered in.

parameters.name: pageSize

get.description:

post.description: A query model which supports the OPC UA Global Discovery Server query.

activation filter during application registration or discovery.

discoveryUrl.description: Discovery url to use for registration

callback.description: An optional callback hook to register.

activationFilter.description: Upon discovery, activate all endpoints with this filter.

uri.description:
Uri to call - should use https scheme in which
case security is enforced.

method.description: Http Method to use for callback

authenticationHeader.description: Authentication header to add or null if not needed

trustLists.description:
Certificate trust list identifiers to use for
activation, if null, all certificates are
trusted.  If empty list, no certificates are
trusted which is equal to no filter.

securityPolicies.description:
Endpoint security policies to filter against.
If set to null, all policies are in scope.

securityMode.description:
Security mode level to activate. If null,
then Microsoft.Azure.IIoT.OpcUa.Registry.Models.SecurityMode.Best is assumed.

applicationName.description: Default name of the server or client.

localizedNames.description: Localized names key off locale id.

capabilities.description: The OPC UA defined capabilities of the server.

discoveryProfileUri.description: The discovery profile uri of the server.

id.description: New id application was registered under

locale.description: Locale of default name - defaults to "en"

localizedNames.description: Localized Names of application keyed on locale

capabilities.description: The capabilities advertised by the server.

hostAddresses.description: Host addresses of server application or null

addressRangesToScan.description: Address ranges to scan (null == all wired nics)

maxNetworkProbes.description: Max network probes that should ever run.

portRangesToScan.description: Port ranges to scan (null == all unassigned)

maxPortProbes.description: Max port probes that should ever run.

minPortProbesPercent.description: Probes that must always be there as percent of max.

idleTimeBetweenScansSec.description: Delay time between discovery sweeps in seconds

discoveryUrls.description: List of preset discovery urls to use

locales.description: List of locales to filter with during discovery

callbacks.description: Callbacks to invoke once onboarding finishes

activationFilter.description: Activate all twins with this filter during onboarding.

endpointUrl.description: Original endpoint url of the endpoint

authenticationMethods.description:
Supported authentication methods that can be selected to
obtain a credential and used to interact with the endpoint.

url.description: Endpoint url to use to connect with

alternativeUrls.description:
Alternative endpoint urls that can be used for
accessing and validating the server

securityMode.description:
Security Mode to use for communication
default to best.

securityPolicy.description:
Security policy uri to use for communication
default to best.

sites.description: Distinct list of sites applications were registered in.

includeNotSeenSince.description: Whether to include endpoints that were soft deleted

uid.description:
Value generated at bootstrap by each instance of the service and
used to correlate logs coming from the same instance. The value
changes every time the service starts.

properties.description: A property bag with details about the service

dependencies.description: A property bag with details about the internal dependencies

discovery.description: Whether the supervisor is in discovery mode

outOfSync.description:
Whether the registration is out of sync between
client (module) and server (service) (default: false).

connected.description: Whether supervisor is connected on this registration

discovery.description:
Whether the supervisor is in discovery mode.
If null, does not change.

discoveryCallbacks.description: Callbacks to add or remove (see below)
